https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gJoqkug3ivtNLGX6lWFED1eHmhW.jpg In July 2005, black teenager Anthony Walker was murdered by two white men in an unprovoked racist attack in a Liverpool park. He was just 18 years old. This film tells the story of how this talented young man's life might have turned out. Anthony
